header.div: Now look at how the candidates deal with the follow-up question.

div.p: Describe an advertisement you have seen, on TV or elsewhere, that made an impression on you.

ul.li: what effect it had on you

div.p: And explain why you find this type of advertising admirable or not.
At the end of Part 2, the Examiner often asks a question. The next clip shows the end of each candidate's talk about an advertisement. Look at the different ways they answer the question.
Zafir should have expanded in one or two short sentences.
Dmitris performs much better. Always remember to give reasons for your answers, rather then just agreeing or disagreeing with the statement the examiner makes.
